message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you a great deal on this fantastic product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $95.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $85. Can you meet me at that price?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob, but I'm not sure I can go as low as $85. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll offer it to you for $90.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit higher than that. I'd be willing to pay $87.50. Can you consider that?

I can see you're really interested in this product, Bob! I'm willing to make one more concession. I'll offer it to you for $91.50. This is as low as I'm willing to go, but I think you'll really love it.
I really appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit away from that price. I'd be willing to pay $89. Can you consider that?
I think we're getting close, Bob! I'm willing to meet you halfway again, so I'll offer it to you for $90.50. This is my final concession, so I hope you'll consider it.
I appreciate your persistence, but I'm still not quite there. I'd be willing to pay $88. Can you really not meet me at that price?

I'm not willing to go any lower than $90, Bob. I think we're very close to a deal, but I need to make sure I get a fair price for the product. I'm willing to meet you at $90, but that's as low as I can go.
I think we're getting a bit too close to the price I can get from John, and I'm not willing to go above $88. Can you really not meet me at that price?
